## ɵSetReadonly() function

Sets NgSelect as readonly, non editable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ɵSetReadonly<TValue>(readonly?: boolean): NgSelectAction<TValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  readonly | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether is select readonly or not, if omitted defaults to true |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NgSelectAction<TValue>`
